text: This section describes the Pulse agent. This is a collection agent for real-time workflow configurations. The Pulse agent is useful for testing because it functions as a collection agent and an internal data source. You can use this agent to generate random or specific data while simulating various traffic patterns through stochastic distributions. Open Workflow with the Pulse agent The section contains the following subsections: Pulse Agent Configuration Pulse Agent Events Pulse Agent Input/Output Data and MIM PulseUDR
title: Pulse Agent - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
